00000002 ; patadr, pattern address 0
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 0, redundant
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000002 ; BIAS ON
0000000C
00000001
00000001
00000004 ; patclk at 1 tick for PULSE 
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000001
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse, meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000002 ; width, 200ns, 2 ticks
00000000 
00000000
00000001 ; meas flag
00000001 ; meas offset
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk at 5 ticks for PTN_BRANCH 
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000005
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000006 ; PTN_BRANCH to PULSE at 1
00000046
00000001
00000000
00000002 ; 2 pulses in loop
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000 ; pattern ending address, not used
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
